column5: Anybody been to Boois on Trout Lake this year? Or any lodge on Trout Lake? Looking for any reports.

Came back from Cat Island Lodge on July 5, walleye fishing was Great! Lots of 21-25" fish. We fished mostly in 12-15', minnows and gulp leeches. I didn't fish much for Lakers but guys seemed to be doing well in 60 - 80'. It was HOT and the black flies were bad.
